import React from 'react' function SortTableItems() { const sort=()=>{ const table=document.querySelector('#table') let tbody=table.querySelector('tbody') let rows=tbody.querySelectorAll('tr') for(let i=0; iNumber(currval)){ tbody.insertBefore(rows[j],rows[i]) $() } } } } return (
